QuestData.Title: The Call of the Hunt
QuestData.Description:
I fear Lord Herne will have further need of our aid before this night is over.
Come, I'll put some wings on you. We'll have to fly if we want to keep up with him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Lord Herne in Ardenweald.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Lord Herne in Ardenweald.
QuestData.RewardText: Damn the Drust! This was all a diversion!
